text: "False Prophet" is a single by the American singer-songwriter Bob Dylan, released on May 8, 2020. The song was released on the same day Dylan announced his 39th studio album, Rough and Rowdy Ways. The music is based on Billy "The Kid" Emerson's 1954 Sun Records single "If Lovin' Is Believin'". ==See also== * List of Bob Dylan songs based on earlier tunes ==References== ==External links== * Category:2020 singles Category:2020 songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Columbia Records singles Category:Songs written by Bob Dylan Category:Blues rock songs
title: False Prophet (song)
